metadata.title: CVE-2020-36309 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ngx_http_lua_module (aka lua-nginx-module) before 0.10.16 in OpenResty allows unsafe characters in an argument when using the API to mutate a URI, or a request or response header.

notes.note: mdeslaur> The lua module is included in the debian directory as it is not part of the upstream nginx release. It is included in the nginx-extras binary package in universe.

criterions.comment: nginx package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
